title: Getting User Input
content: Use `input()` to get text from the user, then convert it to a number with `float()`: `amount = float(input('Enter amount: '))`

title: Calculating the Tip
content: To calculate a percentage: multiply by the percentage and divide by 100. For example: `tip = bill * (percentage / 100)`

title: Formatting Currency
content: Use `:.2f` in f-strings to show exactly 2 decimal places: `f'${amount:.2f}'`

title: Complete Structure
content: 1. Get bill amount with `float(input())` 2. Get tip % with `float(input())` 3. Calculate tip: `bill * (tip_pct / 100)` 4. Add bill + tip for total 5. Print with `:.2f` formatting
